questions.question: Q 1. How do I book a workspace on CoWorkMate?
questions.answer: A. Simply search by location and date, browse available spaces, and click “Book Now.” You’ll receive instant confirmation via email.

questions.question: Q 2. Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
questions.answer: A. Yes! You can cancel or modify bookings from your dashboard. Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before the start time.

questions.question: Q 3. What amenities are included in a workspace?
questions.answer: A. Each space varies, but most include high-speed Wi-Fi, power outlets, coffee, printers, and access to common areas.

questions.question: Q 4. Do I need a subscription to use CoWorkMate?
questions.answer: A. No subscription needed! You only pay for the time and space you use. Simple and flexible.

questions.question: Q 5. Is customer support available if I have issues?
questions.answer: A. Absolutely. We offer 24/7 live chat and email support to assist you before, during, and after your booking.
